articles.title: Australian comic Lewis Spears discovers death of Prince Philip while mocking Prince Philip - PerthNow
articles.description: An Australian comedian has uploaded footage of himself mocking Prince Philip for being old and racist during a show — just seconds before discovering the 99-year-old had died. LANGUAGE WARNING

articles.title: Scott Morrison abandons target to have all Australians vaccinated against COVID-19 by the end of the year - ABC News
articles.description: Scott Morrison says given the uncertainties around the AstraZeneca vaccine, the federal government can no longer set targets for the delivery of COVID-19 vaccinations.
articles.content:
The Prime Minister has abandoned all targets for the nationwide rollout of COVID-19 vaccines after new medical advice threw the program into disarray.

articles.description: Victoria will downgrade the Brisbane, Gladstone and Byron Bay areas from "orange" to "green" zones from midnight.

articles.title: NASA delays Mars helicopter flight to at least April 14th - Yahoo News Australia
articles.description: NASA has delayed the first flight of its Mars helicopter to at least April 14 after an issue during a test.
